episodes.title: ‘Nobody Saved Us’: Man Describes Youth in ‘Cult’
episodes.description:
Jamey Anderson says his time in Word of Faith Fellowship was a hell of physical and emotional abuse. Now, he’s determined to speak out about the North Carolina-based church so no more kids go through what he says he suffered. (Dec. 13)

episodes.title: Ex-Members: Church Uses Pull, Lies to Keep Kids
episodes.description:
An Associated Press investigation has found that a secretive evangelical church has used lies and intimidation to bring in and keep children. Ex-members of Word of Faith Fellowship say the kids are exposed to sometimes violent church practices. (Nov. 13)

episodes.title: AP Exclusive: Abuse, Terror Haunt Ex Churchgoers
episodes.description:
From all over the world, they flocked to Spindale, North Carolina, lured by promises of inner peace and eternal life. What many found instead: years of terror — waged in the name of the Lord. The Word of Faith Fellowship denies the allegations. (Feb. 27)
